itunes:title: This Is the Church Week 5 with Anne Lincoln Holibaugh
title: This Is the Church Week 5 with Anne Lincoln Holibaugh
description:
In the fifth and final week of our This Is the Church study, Raechal and Amanda are joined by Anne Lincoln Holibaugh, Associate Minister of Family Ministries at The Village Church Denton. The three reflect on the journey of this study and how who we are as God’s people—those who have been reconciled to Him—informs how we live together in unity as His Church. Join us for the concluding conversation around this reading plan as we remember that we are flawed people on this journey of faith, but called to anchor our lives and ministries in the person, work, and hope of Jesus. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 5 of the She Reads Truth This Is the Church reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Title collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-church-week-5-with-anne-lincoln-holibaugh
